rooms.description: Spacious entrance area with a reception desk, integrated lighting design in line with Vastu for positive energy flow.
Open plan living area combining dining and social space with large window openings for natural light in the south-east direction, enhancing energy flow.
Quiet master bedroom with a private balcony for relaxation and natural light in accordance with Vastu principles.
Cozy guest bedroom ensuring privacy and tranquility with minimal external noise.
Well-lit study/library area enriched with built-in bookshelves and chettinad decorative motifs; placed in the northeast corner to promote learning and wisdom as per Vastu.
Efficient kitchen area with modern appliances, designed in the south-east region to enhance activity as per Vastu, adjacent to dining area.
Functional ensuite bathroom with water-efficient fixtures and ample storage; positioned away from the master bedroom for privacy.
Integrated wardrobe space adjacent to bedrooms ensuring organized storage while maintaining chettinad aesthetics.

openings.description: Main entrance door with a chettinad style archway design, aligned with Vastu principles for energy flow.
Secondary entrance for service and utility areas, designed to minimize traffic into living spaces.
Large windows in the master bedroom balcony area for natural light and Vastu compliance.
